review_data.title: Freundlich und gemütlich

review_data.title: A quick stop turned into an enjoyable evening
review_data.content: We approached the lounge-style bar & café expecting a small bite to eat. We were greeted with extremely friendly staff, into a very cozy, comfortable and modern environment. The establishment is new and forms part of the Hotel Frohsinn. The building was extremely modern, clean...More
